name: Module Match: SAP Portfolio Challenge
description: In this interactive game, test your knowledge of SAP's newest products and solutions by matching them to the appropriate portfolio categories: Data, AI, and Cloud. Learn about cutting-edge technologies while having fun!
detail: SAP drives the intelligent enterprise by combining a unified Data fabric (Datasphere), generative Business AI (Joule), and a modular Cloud ERP foundation (S/4HANA) to optimize business processes.

howToPlay.objective: Correctly identify SAP products that belong to each portfolio area.
steps: Select a portfolio category (Data, AI, or Cloud)
Review the list of SAP products shown
Choose the products that correctly belong to the selected portfolio
Submit your selection to validate your choices
howToPlay.winCondition: All SAP products are correctly matched to their respective portfolio
